project.name: Enhanced Document Search with Advanced Filters
project.description: This feature enhances the document search capabilities in paperless-ngx by adding advanced filtering options, improved relevance ranking, and search analytics. The goal is to help users find documents faster and improve overall user experience.

objectives.metric_success_criteria: Reduce average time to find a document from 2 minutes to 30 seconds
Increase search result relevance score (user feedback) by 40%
Enable filtering by multiple criteria simultaneously (date range, tags, correspondents, document types)
Track and display search patterns to help users understand their document organization

features.name: Advanced Filter Panel
features.description: Add a comprehensive filter panel that allows users to filter documents by date range, tags, correspondents, document types, and custom fields. Filters should be combinable and persist across sessions.

features.name: Improved Relevance Ranking
features.description: Enhance the search algorithm to prioritize documents based on recency, relevance score, and user interaction history. Implement configurable ranking weights.

features.name: Search Suggestions and Autocomplete
features.description: Provide real-time search suggestions as users type, including tag suggestions, correspondent names, and common search terms based on user history.

features.name: Saved Searches
features.description: Allow users to save frequently used search queries with filters for quick access. Saved searches should be shareable and manageable.

features.name: Search Analytics Dashboard
features.description: Display search statistics including most searched terms, filter usage patterns, and search success rates to help users understand their document organization.
